articles.title: NDC of DPRK Clarifies Principled Stand on DPRK-U.S. Relations
articles.content:
NDC of DPRK Clarifies Principled Stand on DPRK-U.S. Relations
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK in a statement Saturday revealed the deceptive nature of the rhetoric about non-aggression on the DPRK made by the U.S. recently, and principled stand of the DPRK on the DPRK-U.S. relations.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The tense situation that persisted on the Korean Peninsula for the past six decades after the ceasefire has not developed into a war. This is entirely thanks to the peace-loving efforts and just struggle waged by the army and people of the DPRK despite their bitter pain resulting from territorial and national division.
					
					 On October 3 U.S. Secretary of State Kerry said that if the DPRK starts denuclearization first, the U.S. will be ready to have dialogue with it and that if it becomes clear that the DPRK started denuclearization, Washington will open peaceful relations with Pyongyang and sign a non-aggression pact.
					
					 Disclosing the hypocritical nature of his remarks, the statement went on:
					
					 His remarks, which mean that the U.S. will enter into friendly relations with the DPRK after it is left bare-handed, are the height of American-style impudence and craftiness.
					
					 We are well aware that even though it clamored for non-aggression, the U.S. is running the whole gamut of intrigues to lead the DPRK to "change" and "collapse", while persistently opposing the withdrawal of its aggression troops from south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. call on the DPRK to lay down arms and remain bare-handed is an intolerable mockery and insult to the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 It is disgusting to see the U.S. playing the role of a leading character with high skill in the charade.
					
					 The U.S. proposal for non-aggression cannot guarantee peace and security on the Korean Peninsula but the nuclear-armed revolutionary forces for self-defence of the DPRK can defend and guarantee everything.
					
					 The statement clarified the principled stand of the DPRK as follows as the U.S. takes issue with the nuclear issue and talks about the DPRK-U.S. relations while escalating all sorts of pressure offensives against the DPRK:
					
					1.  If the U.S. truly wants to improve the relations with the DPRK, it has to properly understand the DPRK and behave as befitting a big power.
					
					 The DPRK is no longer a small and weak country which used to be in the past when it was hacked at the point of bayonets of big powers for it had neither sovereignty nor arms.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can frighten the army and people of the DPRK through the "gunboat" offensive, with which it used to browbeat the world and bring its rival to its knees in the past, and through the superiority in the air based on latest science and technology, and can hurt the DPRK through the vicious moves for isolating and stifling it politically and economically.
					
					 The U.S. tragedy is that it does not know about the DPRK which is demonstrating its strong spirit and its army and people who love and value their country more than their own lives.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants to mend the relations with the DPRK, it should properly understand the DPRK supported even by tens of millions of south Koreans, and behave itself as befitting a big country.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer talk about dialogue and improvement of relations with preconditions nor maintain the brigandish insistence that non-aggression is possible only when the DPRK dismantles its nuclear weapons first.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK can discern the ulterior intention concealed in the dialogue and non-aggression proposed by the U.S.
					
					2. The U.S. should discard the old way of thinking and outdated stand and abandon the threadbare hostile policy toward the DPRK, before it is too late.
					
					 For a good while the U.S., when meeting with DPRK officials behind closed doors, used to talk volubly that Washington has no intent to pursue policy hostile toward the DPRK. In recent public appearances Washington is working hard to build public opinion, claiming that it has neither hostile policy toward the DPRK nor willingness to replace the regime in the DPRK by attacking it. But in actuality it is working hard to realize its attempt at the regime change while systematically escalating all sorts of sanctions, isolation and blockade against the DPRK after invariably labeling it as part of "an axis of evil" and a "rogue state" behaving contrary to "law standard" and "international cord of conduct."
					
					 The situation goes to fully prove that the U.S. assertions that it has neither hostile policy toward the DPRK nor intent to attack it are a poor farce for deceiving the public at home and abroad and mocking at the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. wants to escape the pent-up grudge and retaliation of the army and people of the DPRK, it should drop its old way of thinking and outdated stand and make a bold decision to roll back its old hostile policy toward the DPRK before it is too late.
					
					3. The U.S. should clearly understand the meaning of the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and lift all steps for isolating and stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is the consistent policy goal set forth by the DPRK government. It calls for the denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula including south Korea.
					
					 This denuclearization is a peace-loving and powerful physical means for defusing all the U.S. nuclear threats to the DPRK and denuclearizing the world. 
					
					 If the U.S. continues threat and blackmail against the DPRK, the DPRK will get more time in its favor and the U.S. will only precipitate its miserable end. 
					
					 In other words, the DPRK will prosper with increasing vigor and strength, as it has smaller, diversified and precision nuclear weapons, but the U.S. will remain as a bubble marginalized in history.
					
					 The U.S. should, first of all, lift all the sanctions it imposed against the DPRK under absurd charges, if it wants to get rid of the present poor situation. 
					
					 It should stop resorting to the stereo-typed nuclear blackmail against the DPRK. 
					
					 The further the U.S. escalates its nuclear threat and blackmail, the deeper it will find itself in self-contradiction and bottomless labyrinth. 
					
					 What we would like to emphasize is that the U.S. should take a bold decision to halt at once all the provocations against the DPRK including war exercises which aim at bringing down its social system and territorial invasion. 
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the U.S. should make a policy switchover by withdrawing all the measures it has taken to isolate and stifle the DPRK as part of its greedy pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy. 
					
					 Herein lies the way for improving the DPRK-U.S. relations and guaranteeing peace and security not only on the Korean Peninsula but  in the U.S. mainland.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Crying out for Their Dignity
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Crying out for Their Dignity
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are clinging to the moves of insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system.
					 In this regard the spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) gave an answer to the question put by KCNA on Saturday.
					
					 It says:
					
					 On Wednesday the minister of Unification of south Korea impudently said the great politics of love for the people pursued by the DPRK is aimed to "achieve exploits" and "highlight the image of love for people". On Tuesday he talked nonsense that south Korea has the "dignity of 50 million people" while finding fault with the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and asserting that "the north's mud-slinging at the south has gone beyond the limit".
					
					 Such a move is another intolerable heinous and grave provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 As admired by the world, the politics of love for people pursued by Marshal Kim Jong Un is producing stirring events day after day in the DPRK.
					
					 Such an admirable reality can be found only in the socialist system centered on the popular masses in which the whole society forms a big harmonious family. The puppet forces of south Korea dared compare this with their petty and reactionary politics by which they make a spate of every wicked sermon to earn the grass-root support at every election and make false propaganda guided by such a way of thinking. How shabby and foul they are!
					
					 Irony is that they cried out for the "dignity of 50 million people".
					
					 This ridiculous move is enough to make even a cat to laugh.
					
					 South Korea is not in a position to talk about the dignity as it is under the military occupation by the U.S. which holds control of all domains including politics and military affairs.
					
					 It is indeed preposterous for those who turned south Korea into the barren land to talk about the "dignity of 50 million people", an intolerable mockery of south Koreans.
					
					 Now under way in south Korea are actions of various circles demanding the probe into the truth about the case of the puppet Intelligence Service's interference in the "presidential election" and the nullification of the results of the "election".
					
					 Park Geun Hye is being disgraced as "half president" due to the fraud-marred election and is faced with denunciation and rejection by the people for trying to revive the ill-famed "yusin" dictatorship. Park's group is not entitled at all to speak about the "dignity of 50 million people".
					
					 If there be any in south Korea, there is grudge of the 50 million people who had their dignity violated by the puppet group of traitors.
					
					 The puppet group, made up of confrontational maniacs seized by the hysteric fit and hell-bent on antagonism, hostility and evil moves, is persistently making vituperation slandering the dignity and social system of the DPRK. It is nothing but a shriek made by those taken aback by the bright reality in the DPRK which wins only victories day by day and achieves prosperity thanks to the politics of believing in people as in Heaven and leadership of Kim Jong Un. It is also its last-ditch efforts to get rid of serious crisis at home and abroad.
					
					 The DPRK, as it had already warned, will never tolerate but resolutely punish anyone who slanders the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system even a bit.
					
					 The Park's group should properly govern its tongue, if it does not want to face the same miserable end as what was met by those who went hell-bent on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Greetings to Spanish King
articles.content:
Greetings to Spanish King 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Juan Carlos I, king of Spain, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim extended warm congratulations to the king and his people and sincerely wished the friendly country steady development and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of the independence of the country.
					 Kim expressed his conviction that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger thanks to the bilateral common efforts and wished the president and his people greater successes in their work for building prosperous Equatorial Guinea.

articles.title: WPK Secretary Meets French Delegation
articles.content:
WPK Secretary Meets French Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), on Saturday met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the French Group for the Study of the DPRK of senate members from different parties led by Chairman Jean-Claude Frecon, senate member from the French Socialist Party.
					 Present there were Vice Department Director Ri Yong Chol and other officials of the WPK Central Committee, and Olivier Vaysset, director of the Cooperation Bureau of France here.

articles.title: WPK Hosts Reception for French Delegation
articles.content:
WPK Hosts Reception for French Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) hosted a reception in honor of the visiting delegation of the French Group for the Study of the DPRK of senate members from different parties led by Chairman Jean-Claude Frecon, senate member from the French Socialist Party, at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Saturday. 
					 Present there on invitation were the visiting delegation led by Jean-Claude Frecon and Olivier Vaysset, director of the Cooperation Bureau of France here. 
					
					 Attending it were Secretary Kim Yong Il, Vice Department Director Ri Yong Chol and other officials of the C.C., WPK. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Reception Given by Russian Ambassador to Mark Establishment of Diplomatic Ties
articles.content:
Reception Given by Russian Ambassador to Mark Establishment of Diplomatic Ties
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin gave a reception at his embassy on Friday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy attended.
					
					 Alexandr Timonin said in his speech at the reception that the friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Russia have deep historical roots.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The leaders of the two countries pay deep attention to the development of the friendly relations.
					
					 Today Russia and the DPRK should develop the good tradition which was provided in the course of developing the friendly relations.
					
					 The Russia-DPRK cooperation should be developed on the principle of good neighborliness, equality and mutual benefits for the well-being of the people in the future, too.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun said in his speech that he was pleased over the fact that the government and people of Russia have achieved great successes in their work for developing the economy of the country and achieving the socio-political stability.
					
					 He wished the friendly Russian people greater success in their work for building powerful Russia under the leadership of President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					
					 He reaffirmed that the DPRK would further expand and develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK-China Trade Fair Opens in China
articles.content:
DPRK-China Trade Fair Opens in China
 Dandong, October 11 (KCNA Correspondent) -- A DPRK-China trade fair opened at the Guomenwan International Business Center in Dandong City, China, on October 11.
					 On display there are more than 50 000 items of products of the DPRK and China in 1 900 kinds, covering CNC machine tools, light industrial and medicinal goods and foodstuff.
					
					 Pak Ung Sik, a director of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau, told KCNA that the fair marks a good occasion in giving momentum to economic cooperation between the DPRK and China.
					
					Lu Jianming, a staff of the Nanjing Sanqing Pharmaceutical Science and Technology Co., Ltd. in China, said:
					
					 "A progress has been made in economic relations between China and the DPRK. Many-sided and efficient contacts and interchanges will bring about mutual development and prosperity." 
					
					 Shan Huajie, a Dandong citizen, said:
					
					 "Such kind of trade fair will be conducive to further developing the China-DPRK relations, I think."
					
					 Wang Yangzhi, manager of the Dandong Zhehang Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. said:
					
					 "It is my pleasure to take part in the DPRK-China trade fair held in Dandong.
					
					 I will make a contribution to enhancing the economic cooperation and exchange between the two countries."

articles.title: National Folk Art Troupe Performs in Dandong, China
articles.content:
National Folk Art Troupe Performs in Dandong, China
 Dandong, October 12 (KCNA Correspondent) -- The National Folk Art Troupe gave a performance at a stadium in Dandong, China from October 10 to 12 to mark the 2nd DPRK-China Economic, Trade, Cultural and Tourism EXPO.
					 Among the audience were Vice-Governor Bing Zhigang and other personages and people of Liaoning Province and the city, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials and diplomatic envoys accredited to the DPRK.
					
					 Also watching the performance were members of the DPRK delegation of the EXPO led by Hong Kil Nam, vice-chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, Kim Kwang Hun, DPRK consul-general in Shenyang, and Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					
					 The performance began with the playing of immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung." Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as female solo "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", male solo "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party", song and dance "Wild Rose" and male quintet "It Is Offensive."
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who made tangible contribution to the development of the traditional DPRK-China friendly relations and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence, and the DPRK bringing into reality the people's desire under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They also presented Chinese songs reflective of the emotion of the Chinese people.
					
					 A floral basket was presented to the performers in congratulation of their successful performance.

articles.title: State Commendations Awarded to Persons of Merit
articles.content:
State Commendations Awarded to Persons of Merit
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK awarded state commendations to service personnel, workers and officials who made sincere efforts for sprucing up the area of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun. 
					 The relevant decree was promulgated on October 9. 
					
					 According to it, the title of the Labor Hero of the DPRK was awarded to Ri Son Chol and Kim Jin Nam and Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize to Kim Chong Song, Kye Jong Jin and Ri Son Gun. 
					
					 The title of Merited Designer went to one person, the title of Merited Driver to two persons, Order of National Flag 1st Class to 64, Order of Labor to 40, Order of National Flag 2nd Class to 566, Order of Soldier's Honor 1st Class to 52, Order of National Flag 3rd Class to 855, Order of Soldier's Honor 2nd Class to 110, Distinguished Military Service Medal to 171 and Medal of Merit to 1 409. The number of the recipients totals 3 275.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Its Australian Rival 6:2
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Its Australian Rival 6:2
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The league matches of the 2013 Asian U-19 Women's Football Championship are under way in Nanjing, China.
					 The teams of the DPRK, China, Myanmar, Australia, Japan and south Korea will play matches from October 11 to 20.
					
					 A match between the DPRK and Australian teams took place on Friday. The DPRK team defeated its rival 6:2.
					
					 The DPRK team will hold the second match with the Chinese team on October 13.

articles.title: DPRK Table-tennis Players Win in Mixed Doubles
articles.content:
DPRK Table-tennis Players Win in Mixed Doubles
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK table-tennis players Kim Hyok Bong and Kim Jong bagged gold medals in the mixed doubles at the 6th East Asian Games.
					 They beat the south Korean team 3:1 in 16 superstar tournament, the Japanese team 3:2 in quarterfinals, the Chinese team 4:3 in the semi-finals and advanced into the final.
					
					 At the fierce and close final game with the south Korean players on Friday the DPRK's pair defeated the rivals 4:3, winning the first place.
					
					 Another pair Kim Nam Chol and Kim Hye Song took the third place in the mixed doubles.
					
					 And the DPRK took the second place in the 10-meter men's air pistol event.
					
					 Jo Chol Sok took the second place in men's 60 kg category of Wushu Sanshu and Yun Song Sil the third place in women's 52 kg category event.
					
					 Kim Jin Ok and Kim Un Hyang bagged silver medals in women's pair 10 meter platform diving and Kim Jin Hyang and Kim Jin Ok bronze medals in women's pair 3 meter springboard diving.
					
					 Pak Kum Hyang took the third place in women's 3 000 m hurdle race.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Placed First at East Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Placed First at East Asian Games 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team came top at the 6th East Asian Games in Tianjin, China.
					 The team beat Chinese and China's Taipei teams before having a match with the Japanese team on Friday.
					
					 The DPRK team succeeded in scoring two goals in about 27 and 39 minutes, thus placing first in women's football matches at the Games.

articles.title: National Flower Exhibition Held
articles.content:
National Flower Exhibition Held 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The National Flower Exhibition was held in the April 15 Children's Flower Garden from October 8 to 12 with the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea as an occasion.
					 Participated in the exhibition were ministries and national institutions, including the General Bureau of Pleasure Park and floriculturists across the country.
					
					 More than 300 species of flowers and shrubs, which accounted for over 32 000 pieces, were put on display in the way of being potted or forming miniascape.
					
					 What caught the visitors' eyes were the miniatures of the Arch of Triumph and the Monument to Party Founding bedecked with flowers and shrubs by floricultural units in Pyongyang City.
					
					 Among those exhibits was a Korean map shaped with an ornamental shrub, on which were floral letters meaning "one" in reflection of the Korean people's desire for national reunification.
					
					 Conspicuous were also the flowers and plants exhibited by North Hamgyong, North Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces.
					
					 The exhibition witnessed various forms of plant sculptures and hedges.
					
					 The exhibitors shared a range of experiences they gained in cultivating flowers and other plants.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Buddhists Mass Prays for Reunification
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Buddhists Mass Prays for Reunification
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The north-south joint Buddhists mass praying for country's reunification to mark the 6th anniversary of the restoration of Singye Temple on Mt. Kumgang took place at the temple on Saturday.
					 Present there were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea, monks of Singye Temple and believers from the north side and those of Buddhist Jogye Order from the south side.
					
					 Speeches were made, which was followed by a Buddhist ritual. Then a joint prayer of the north-south Buddhist mass praying for the country's reunification was read out.
					
					 The speakers said that the Singye Temple, though it has been restored to its original state by the joint efforts of the Buddhists in the north and the south, is not fulfilling its role as a key Buddhist temple for reunification and the distrust and confrontation deepen between the north and south due to the obstructive maneuvers of the anti-reunification conservative forces at home and abroad. And unpardonable acts go on, defaming and ignoring the valuable successes achieved in the June 15 era, they added.
					
					 The speakers called on Buddhists of the north and south to fulfill their mission as Buddhist saints for reunification and turn out in the practical actions for improving the north-south relations and achieving the reconciliation and unity of the nation.
					
					 The prayer clarified the pledge of the Buddhists of the north and south to work hard to foil the moves against the nation and reunification on the part of hostile forces at home and abroad, remove the danger of war and achieve the durable peace and reunification on this land in Dharma-minded concord as indicated by the inter-Korean declarations.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Chinese side headed by Shu Yinbiao, executive president of the State Grid Corporation of China, arrived here on Saturday to take part in the 65th meeting of the Board of Directors of the Korea-China Hydro-Electric Power Company slated to be held here.

articles.title: Russians Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russians Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Orchestra of the 21st Century of Russia led by Pavel Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the orchestra, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues before paying tribute to them.
					
					 The orchestra arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: War and Peace Cannot Go Together: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
War and Peace Cannot Go Together: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The situation on the Korean Peninsula had been put on the orbit of detente but is now inching close to the brink of war again due to the nuclear war maneuvers of the U.S. and Japanese aggression forces and the south Korean puppet forces.
					 The hostile forces started a large-scale joint naval strike maneuver targeting the DPRK in the waters off the Korean Peninsula despite the strong warnings of the DPRK and concern of the international community.
					
					 As predicted by the world public that ultra-large nuclear-powered carrier George Washington belonging to the U.S. 7th Fleet will play a leading role in case the second Korean war breaks out, the large strike group of the carrier entered Pusan Port for this saber-rattling.
					
					 The gravity and danger of such saber-rattling have reached an extreme phase as it is taking place right after the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group confirmed the "tailored deterrence strategy" aimed at mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and the U.S. approved the Japanese reactionaries' "right to collective self-defense".
					
					 The situation on the peninsula is at the crossroads of war and peace, going beyond the line of confrontation or dialogue.
					
					 This is a blatant challenge to the peaceful efforts of the DPRK and public opinion at home and abroad calling for defusing the tensions on the peninsula as it is another dangerous military adventure.
					
					 As already known, the DPRK has made every possible effort to end a vicious cycle of tensions on the peninsula and provide peaceful environment in favor of building an economic power and improving the standard of people's living. It took a series of practical steps, clarifying its positive will for peace and dialogue by reflecting the aspiration of the fellow countrymen for national reconciliation, unity and reunification. A particular mention should be made of the fact that it clarified the stand for dialogue without conditions and advanced on its own initiative proposals for this, prompted by the desire to ensure durable peace and stability on the peninsula and realize its denuclearization.
					
					   As recognized by the international community, it was something unprecedented that the DPRK exercised its maximum self-restraint during Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces in August last. But contrary to this, they persisted in the policy of confrontation and war racket.
					
					 Talking about someone's "trustworthy" priority steps, the U.S. introduced three major nuclear strike means into the peninsula and its vicinity one after another, rounding off the physical and institutional preparations to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces, pursuant to their American master's Asia strategy and timetable for war of aggression against the DPRK, escalated anti-DPRK conspiracies and moves for igniting a war, openly crying out for "confrontation accompanied by dialogue".
					
					 Touring foreign countries, they hurt the dignity and social system of the DPRK and incited the atmosphere of confrontation, undisguisedly revealing their scenario for "toppling its regime".
					
					 The above-said racket is part of such scenario, the last phase for carrying out it.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that "confidence", "respect" and "detente" touted by the U.S. and other hostile forces are nothing but hypocrisy and it is their real intention and final goal to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 This fully reveals the despicable true colors of the U.S. and its stooges as wreckers of peace and stability on the peninsula as proven by the involvement of the nuclear carrier in the maneuver.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to take military countermeasures as the striking targets are huge and close and they often come within the striking range of its army.
					
					 The hostile forces had better stop behaving rashly towards the emergency countermeasures being taken by the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an article to the first anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Sons and Daughters of Revolutionary Martyrs Should Become the Reliable Backbone of the Songun Revolution Who Would Stoutly Carry Forward the Lineage of Mangyongdae, the Lineage of Paektu". 
					 Kim Jong Un in his work reviewed with pride the 65 year-long history of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School which have developed into revolutionary schools of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and clarified the character, mission and duty of the schools. He also comprehensively laid out the tasks for drastically improving the education in the schools and ways for doing so. 
					
					 The revolutionary schools bear witness for the noble revolutionary sense of obligation and warm love for posterity shown by the great persons of Mt. Paektu and are the seats for training the children of revolutionary martyrs to be backbones that will carry forward the lineage of the Korean revolution, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Now the students of the schools are growing up to be lifeguards in the Songun era fully equipped with tradition of loyalty and the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, invariable revolutionary faith and faithful sense of obligation. They are being trained to be genuine patriots of the Songun era and persons of conscience who have collectivism and beautiful morality and thoroughly embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism in practice. It is a great pride of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK that the children of revolutionary martyrs are growing up to be the able and versatile talents, backbones of the Songun revolution, being possessed of the latest scientific and technical knowledge, basic military knowledge and the ability to put them into effective use as well as rich emotion and cultural attainments. 
					
					 Servicepersons and people of the DPRK have been able to vigorously advance to a final victory with firm confidence in sure victory and optimism as Kim Jong Un clarified the way for training the backbones to shoulder the future of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, the highest seats for training children of revolutionary martyrs, are the pride of the DPRK and its people, and they are greatly encouraging all the service personnel and people to the drive for prosperity of the country.

articles.title: U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Joint Naval Maneuvers under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Joint Naval Maneuvers under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korea puppet forces started large-scale joint military exercises together with the U.S. and Japan in the South Sea of Korea defying the DPRK's warnings. The U.S. nuclear aircraft carrier George Washington is involved in the naval maneuvers.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in an article in this regard: The warmongers claim the military exercises are aimed to cope with "threat" and "provocation" from the DPRK. This is a shameless assertion falsifying reality which reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" It is a whopping lie intended to conceal their despicable true colors as the disturber of peace and stability
					
					 They have been engrossed in perpetrating provocations and posing threats to the DPRK but charge it with "provocations." This is another intolerable mockery of the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces should bear in mind that their sheer lies will not work in this bright world.
					
					 The prevailing situation indicates that they are keen to ignite a nuclear war in conclusion with the U.S. at any cost, justifying the war moves against the DPRK under the pretext of coping with "provocation" from it. The U.S. and south Korean warmongers are the arch criminals disturbing peace and escalating tension and war threat to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK is possessed of powerful nuclear deterrence capable of foiling the enemies' moves for a nuclear war at a strike and blowing up their strongholds.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces ignite a nuclear war despite the DPRK's repeated warnings, it will mobilize all its war deterrents and deal fatal blows at the provocateurs and thus achieve lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Urged to Stop Escalating Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Urged to Stop Escalating Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea recently tours different countries, letting loose invectives malignantly slandering the DPRK. She made such provocative remarks that the north hurt the separated families by unilaterally canceling their reunions and that the north should dismantle nukes and concentrate efforts on economic development.
					 Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary says this mean behavior reveals once again her imprudence.
					
					 Park is escalating confrontation with compatriots even in foreign countries, an indication of her bad habit that has been steeped to the marrow of her bones, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It was just a few days ago when the DPRK warned her group not to make thoughtless rubbish. She had to behave herself if she has even an iota of judgment.
					
					 However, she responded it with invectives.
					
					 It is quite natural that the south Korean internet paper "Media Today" carried an article ridiculing the "political leaders for making so many lies" and urging "the president not to talk lies."
					
					 If Park persistently slanders the DPRK with such whopping lies in the international arena, the inter-Korean ties will face a total breakdown as in the period of the Lee Myung Bak regime. This will bring Park a flurry of curses and criticism from all Koreans as what was met by traitor Lee. Park had better bear this in mind and stop escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Kicking up Racket Again over North-South Summit Minutes
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Kicking up Racket Again over North-South Summit Minutes
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The issue regarding the minutes of the south-north summit, which seemed calmed down for a while, has again gained momentum in south Korea due to the conspiratorial moves engineered by the puppet group, turning the political circle into a theatre of extreme confusion and ceaseless political strife.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The racket kicked up again by the puppet regime over the issue of the minutes is a sordid politically-motivated intrigue to get rid of its plight isolated at home and abroad due to the worsening inter-Korean relations and its internal crisis and, at the same time, go through without difficulty the coming "by-election" and totally stamp out progressive and pro-democratic forces by mobilizing the conservative forces.
					
					 The present puppet ruling forces are driven into an extreme ruling crisis, being hated and forsaken by the people, owing to their worst unpopular rule going against the trend of the times and the people's mind-set.
					
					 They are now kicking up the reckless racket over the issue of the minutes in a bid to divert elsewhere the people's attention and tide over the crisis.
					
					 The present ruling forces are a horde of unprecedentedly immoral and depraved persons and despicable political gangsters as they are pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst catastrophe, daring slander the north-south summit to meet their partisan interests and sinister political purposes.
					
					 We can never overlook the grave situation in which the contents of the north-south summit minutes which should be most respected in the inter-Korean relations are being seriously insulted by the confrontation maniacs. The puppet group should clearly understand that in case it persists in its moves of kicking up the racket over the issue of the minutes, it will face grave consequences.

articles.title: Children of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School Blessed with Loving Care
articles.content:
Children of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School Blessed with Loving Care
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Today marks the birthday of the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School.
					 After the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung suggested building the school in Pyongyang for the children of revolutionary martyrs.
					
					 On October 12, Juche 36 (1947), Kim Il Sung attended the opening ceremony of the school together with anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Going round the children's rooms one after another, he warmly embraced the orphans who were in tearful joy.
					
					 At that time, Kim Jong Suk told them Kim Il Sung would take care of them, instead of their fathers.
					
					 When leaving the school, Kim Il Sung said he would come to the school on holidays to enjoy the days with orphaned children.
					
					 Later, he visited the school on each holiday and showed deep loving care for them.
					
					 Kim Il Sung's love for the children of the school was creditably carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 When visiting the school on January 2, 1998, Kim Jong Il was very pleased to see the spacious bedrooms, which were remodeled at his instruction he gave during his visit to the school a year before.
					
					 He called for setting up ladders at both sides of the double-storied beds to avoid inconvenience for the children.
					
					 In January 2012, the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un visited the school and congratulated its teachers and students on the lunar New Year's Day
					
					 He said that the President and leader Kim Jong Il had paid deep attention to the children of the school to train them as a backbone of the revolution, always thinking of them.
					
					 He then saw to it that statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were erected at the school.
					
					 A ceremony of unveiling the statues was held at the school on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16, 2013), birthday of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Slam Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Slam Park Geun Hye Regime 
 Tokyo, October 11 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and officials of organizations of the Central Committee of Chongryon issued statements on Oct. 9 in denunciation of the south Korean puppet conservative regime's act of treachery and anti-reunification reckless actions of pushing the inter-Korean ties to the catastrophic phase.
					 Hwang Myong, chairperson of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, condemned the regime for malignantly defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Korean nation, seeking the "regime change" in the DPRK, officially declaring the confrontation of the social systems and slinging mud at it while describing the work in the Kaesong Industrial Zone as the "source of money-making" by the DPRK after taking office.
					
					 Mun Kwang Hui, chairperson of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, denounced the south Korean regime for urging the DPRK to scrap its nuclear program, and crying out for "denuclearization", openly revealing its intention to unleash a nuclear war against the DPRK in collaboration with its American master.
					
					 Ri Ju Hak, chairman of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, lashed out at the regime keen on the war racket against the DPRK for its anti-reunification and treacherous criminal actions.
					
					 Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, condemned Park Geun Hye for staging confrontation rackets every day and making no scruple of using the extremely vitriolic and impudent languages, calling for the "confrontation accompanied by dialogue" and "the theory of principle".
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, said that the Park regime harshly suppressed the pro-reunification patriots in their just struggle, branding them as forces "following the north", far from positively responding to the DPRK's warning.
					
					 Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, noted that all young people in Japan would decisively smash the anti-reunification and treacherous acts of the puppet conservative ruling forces through the close solidarity and unity with the young people in the north and the south and abroad.

articles.title: Document on Sexual Slavery Enforced by Japan in Past Opened to Public
articles.content:
Document on Sexual Slavery Enforced by Japan in Past Opened to Public
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A document proving the  Japanese imperialists' drafting of many women and forcing of them into sexual slavery in the past was disclosed by the State Archives in Tokyo from late in September to October 6.
					 The document under the title of "BC class Batavia trial No. 106 case" records the course of trial of five officers of the Imperial Japanese Army in Batavia (the name of Jakarta of Indonesia at that time), and statements made by the criminals after the end of World War II.
					
					 According to it, the Japanese imperialists forcibly took away dozens of Dutch women who had been camped in Java, Indonesia to comfort stations in various places and forced them into sexual slavery in 1944.
					
					 A Lieut. General of the Japanese army who had been involved in the crime at that time confessed that the sexual slavery was coercively enforced against women.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese  government claimed that there was no evidence proving women were taken away, subjected to violence and threat of the Japanese Army and there were no such accounts directly showing the forcible drafting of women by the army. This glaringly reveals the vicious and shameless nature of Japan as it is sophism intended to falsify the historical fact and evade the responsibility for the crime.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Historic Talk Published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Historic Talk Published in Bulgaria 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was published in booklet by a publishing house of Bulgaria on October 4.  The talk was published in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on August 25 (Day of Songun), Juche 102 (2013).
					 The talk deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and clarifies the essence and originality of the idea of the Songun revolution and the tasks to be carried out to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Bangladesh and DPRK photo, book and art exhibition in Mexico and film shows in Mongolia and Indonesia from Sept. 30 to October 5 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos dealing with immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Displayed there were famous works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art pieces associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "The Monument to Party Founding".
					
					 The president of the Bangladesh People's League said the WPK's 68-year-long history marks glorious days in which it has demonstrated its dignity as an iron-willed and invincible party.
					
					 He wished the WPK and the Korean people bigger success in their struggle for achieving the country's independent reunification and building a thriving socialist nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The director of the school affairs department of the Jurist College of the Mongolian National University, after watching the film, said that he envied the Korean people led by the great party. The history of the victory of the WPK will remain long, the director added.
					
					 The general president of an Indonesian company noted that the film provided a better understanding about the fact that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il founded the WPK and wisely led it and provided a happy life to the people.
					
					 Adopted at the event in Mongolia was a congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Seminars Abroad Mark WPK Anniversary
articles.content:
Seminars Abroad Mark WPK Anniversary
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by the Romanian Socialist Union, the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism and the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics from October 2 to 4 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, said:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un published the work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his work said that President Kim Il Sung was the most prominent leader of the 20th century, peerlessly great man, outstanding and tested leader of revolution, invincible and iron-willed commander and military genius.
					
					 He solemnly clarified that the WPK and army and people of the DPRK will accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche by remaining loyal to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The work reflects the firm faith and will of Kim Jong Un to glorify the undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and successfully carry forward to completion their cause.
					
					 Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that the WPK is successfully fulfilling its mission as vanguard and guiding force of the popular masses under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, upholding the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Ahmed Blaza Lawan, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, noted that Kim Jong Il led the WPK for decades, strengthening it as firm as a rock and turning it into an ideologically pure entity and an integral whole in terms of organization that has achieved uniformity in action.

articles.title: Foreigners Praise WPK
articles.content:
Foreigners Praise WPK
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian and Bangladeshi figures released statements on October 5 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said the WPK has covered the road of victory for years under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK.
					
					 The chief went on:
					
					 The Korean people upheld General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who performed the immortal exploits before the country and revolution by wisely leading the WPK, as eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, is leading the party and people to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered and developed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK will surely win a victory in defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving the reunification and prosperity of the country thanks to the seasoned guidance provided by Marshal Kim Jong Un and the single-minded unity of all the people united close around him.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, extended warm congratulations to the WPK and the Korean people on the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 He said the WPK has successfully discharged its mission and role as the guide of the revolutionary cause of Songun. The WPK led by Kim Jong Un would as ever win only victory, he stressed.

articles.title: Finnish Organization Supports Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Finnish Organization Supports Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Paektu Society of Finland released a statement on October 5 on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said that six years have passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il met former south Korean President Roh Moo Hyun. 
					
					 It added:
					
					 At the north-south summit the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration was reaffirmed and "the Declaration for the Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" was adopted and announced.
					
					 The October 4 declaration is a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The declarations serve as a landmark of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The world progressive people warmly welcomed the historic inter-Korean declarations.
					
					 But they have not been implemented as yet.
					
					 The south Korean conservative ruling forces openly denied the principled issues set forth in the declarations, deteriorating the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The reason that the October 4 declaration has not yet been implemented is that the U.S. staged war maneuvers in the region of the peninsula, pursuant to its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The desire of Koreans to live peacefully has not yet come true due to the U.S. and the south Korean conservative forces.
					
					 Extending the support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for realizing the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, we strongly demand the south Korean regime have correct attitude and stand on the inter-Korean declarations and stop the aggressive joint military exercises with the U.S.
					
					 Korea will be surely reunified under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ve buques de guerra recien construidos y dirige ejercicios moviles
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ve buques de guerra recien construidos y dirige ejercicios moviles
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio los buques de guerra nuevamente construidos y dirigio los ejercicios moviles.
					Le acompanaron Ri Yong Gil, Kim Myong Sik, Ju Kyu Chang y Hong Yong Chil.
					
					El Mariscal fue acogido en el mismo terreno por los funcionarios de la unidad participante en la construccion de los buques.
					
					En pleno acato a la tarea del Comandante Supremo de construir los modernos buques de guerra necesarios a la perfeccion de los preparativos de combate de las fuerzas navales, los cientificos, tecnicos y obreros construyeron nuevamente los buques de guerra a nuestro estilo introduciendo nuevos exitos de ciencia y tecnica militares de punta, dedicando toda su inteligencia creadora y pasion.
					
					El Mariscal hizo detallado conocimiento del desplazamiento, la velocidad, la funcion de armas y otros equipos tecnicos de combate de buques.
					
					Evaluo que al aceptar la idea del partido de superar la tecnica de punta, los cientificos, tecnicos y obreros construyeron en corto plazo los excelentes y modernos buques de combate digitalizados y aligerados en el alto nivel.
					
					Luego, dirigio los ejercicios moviles de los buques de combate.
					
					Al ver la elevada capacidad movil y de ataque de los buques, se mostro muy satisfecho.
					
					Diciendo que nuevos buques de combate tienen capacidad de funcionar con suficiencia en cualesquier circunstancias de combate, se puso muy contento por haber preparado otros medios poderosos que se contribuiran a la perfeccion de los preparativos de combate de las fuerzas navales.
					
					Y presento las tareas programaticas para fortalecer las fuerzas navales conforme a la demanda de guerra moderna y mejorar incesantemente la capacidad de combate en la operacion maritima.

articles.title: CDN expone posicion de principios de RPDC sobre relaciones con EE.UU.
articles.content:
CDN expone posicion de principios de RPDC sobre relaciones con EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- A traves de la declaracion de su portavoz fechada 12, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea revelo el caracter enganoso del rumor de Estados Unidos sobre la no agresion a la RPDC y expuso la posicion de principios de la RPDC sobre el problema de relaciones entre ambos paises.
					Durante 60 anos pasados desde el armisticio en la Peninsula Coreana, la tensa situacion de esta region no se ha extendido a la guerra, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					Eso es el resultado de la justa lucha de nuestro ejercito y pueblo que hicieron ingentes esfuerzos pacifistas aunque sufren la tragedia de la division de territorio nacional. 
					
					El pasado dia 3, el secretario de Estado norteamericano Kerry dijo que su pais esta preparado para dialogar con la RPDC si esta inicia primero la desnuclearizacion.
					
					Agrego que cuando se haga evidente el comienzo de la desnuclearizacion de la RPDC, establecera las relaciones pacificas y firmara el tratado de la no agresion con ella.
					
					Sus palabras son el climax del cinismo y astucia al estilo norteamericano, es decir, la prometa de conciliarse con la RPDC si esta opta por el desarme. 
					
					Ya sabemos que EE.UU., que propuso de repente esta vez la no agresion, niega obstinadamente la retirada de sus tropas ocupantes del suelo surcoreano y recurre a todas las artimanas para inducir el "cambio" y "derrumbe" de la RPDC. 
					
					Pues, la demanda de EE.UU. de que se depongan las armas deviene una burla e insulto intolerables a nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					EE.UU. no debe actuar como buen artista que protagoniza una farsa. 
					
					La propuesta de no agresion de EE.UU. no puede defender la paz ni la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana. Pero, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de autodefensa con armas nucleares pueden defender y garantizar lo todo. 
					
					En estos dias, EE.UU. habla de las relaciones con la RPDC planteando el problema nuclear sin relajar su campana de presion anti-RPDC de todas formas.
					
					Al respecto, se expone la siguiente posicion de principios de la RPDC: 
					
					1. Si EE.UU. desea de veras la mejora de las relaciones con la RPDC debe conocerla correctamente y portarse como digna potencia.
					
					La RPDC no es el pais debil de pasado en que fue pisoteado por las bayonetas de las potencias por no haber contado con su soberania y fusiles.
					
					Es absurdo si EE.UU. piensa en que su ofensiva de "canones" y la supremacia aerea con que amedrentaba al mundo y arrodillaba a sus rivales jactandose de la tecnologia sofisticada, puedan asustar al ejercito y al pueblo de la RPDC y hacer temblarla con sus perversas maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento politicos y economicos.
					
					La tragedia es que EE.UU. no sabe demasiado de nuestra Republica Popular y de nuestro ejercito y pueblo que la aprecian mas que su vida.
					
					Si EE.UU. desea de veras la mejora de las relaciones con la RPDC, debe conocer correctamente a esta que apoyan hasta decenas de millones de surcoreanos y portarse como digno pais grande.
					
					 No debe hablar nunca mas del dialogo y de la mejora de las relaciones anteponiendo las premisas ni del tratado de la no agresion tras renunciar las armas nucleares.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC no son los que no puedan distinguir el astuto intento de EE.UU. ocultado en la propuesta del dialogo y del tratado de la no agresion.
					
					2. EE.UU. debe renunciar, antes de que se haga tarde, su anejada politica hostil anti-RPDC saliendo del caduco modo de pensar.
					
					Durante algun tiempo, en conversaciones a puertas cerradas con la RPDC, EE.UU. solia decir que no tiene la politica hostil a la primera.
					
					  En estos tiempos, lanza una propaganda en ocasiones oficiales en el sentido de que no tiene la politica hostil a la RPDC ni la intencion de derrocar el poder de ella mediante el ataque.
					
					  Pero en realidad, sigue definiendo a la RPDC como "eje del mal" y "pais bribon", que actua sin respetar la "pauta legal" y la "norma internacional de accion", e intenta lograr el derrumbe del regimen recrudeciendo gradualmente la campana de sancion, aislamiento y bloqueo.
					
					  La realidad evidencia que tales palabras de EE.UU. no pasan de ser una farsa para enganar la opinion publica interna y externa burlandose del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					  Para evitar el rencor de sangre y la venganza de nuestros uniformados y habitantes, EE.UU. debe tomar la valiente decision de cancelar su politica hostil a la RPDC. 
					
					3. EE.UU. debe conocer correctamente el significado de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y cancelar todas las medidas orientadas a aislar y atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					  La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es la meta politica invariable que quiere alcanzar el gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					  Esta desnuclearizacion comprende toda la Peninsula Coreana, inclusive el Sur de Corea.
					
					Ella constituye el poderoso medio fisico y pacifista para eliminar hasta la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC abriendo pasos a la desnuclearizacion del mundo entero.
					
					Mientras persistan la amenaza y el chantaje de EE.UU. para tomar a la RPDC, esta ganara mas tiempo provechoso y aquel buscara el tiempo que aceleraria su destino tragico.
					
					  Es decir, la RPDC dispuesta de los medios de ataque nuclear minimizados, diversificados y precisos prosperara mas con el paso de tiempo, pero EE.UU. sera marginado como espuma echada al borde de la historia.
					
					  Para liberarse de la tambaleante situacion de ahora, EE.UU. debe cancelar todas las medidas de sancion contra la RPDC inventadas con pretextos absurdos.
					
					  EE.UU. no debe recurrir por mas tiempo al chantaje nuclear que ejerce a cualquier momento sobre la RPDC.
					
					  Cuanto mas se eleve el grado de amenaza y chantaje nuclear, tanto mas contradictoria sera la situacion de EE.UU. que se hundiria en el pantano sin salida.
					
					  Especialmente, EE.UU. tiene que tomar la decision resuelta de cesar total e inmediatamente todos los actos provocativos como los ejercicios belicos de toda indole que se libran con el objetivo de derrocar nuestro regimen y ocupar nuestro territorio.
					
					  Enfatizamos una vez mas que ese pais debe tomar la decision politica de cancelar diversas medidas de aislamiento, aplastamiento y bloqueo contra la RPDC que se aplican como parte de su ambiciosa estrategia de dar importancia a Asia y Pacifico.
					
					  He aqui el camino de la mejora de las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU. y la garantia de la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y del propio territorio estadounidense.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias por el deceso de Vo Nguyen Giap
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias por el deceso de Vo Nguyen Giap
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del deceso de Vo Nguyen Giap, quien era miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, comandante en jefe del Ejercito Popular de Vietnam y ministro de Defensa, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 11 un mensaje de condolencias al Comite Funeral Estatal de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam.
					En su mensaje, el remitente recordo que Vo Nguyen Giap fue ilustre estadista quien en acato al proposito del Presidente Ho Chi Minh, dedico toda su vida a la lucha de liberacion nacional y la causa socialista e intimo amigo del pueblo coreano que hizo contribucion al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-Vietnam.
					
					Destaco que las nobles hazanas del fallecido acumuladas ante la patria y el pueblo seran grabadas siempre en el corazon del pueblo vietnamita y la humanidad progresista.
